description: Installation of a 17.5m high mast supporting 6 no.x antennas and 2 no.x 300mm diameter dishes, installation of 4 no. x equipment cabinets, plus ancillary works thereto.
decision_conditions: The proposed development by virtue of its siting and appearance would not be appropriate for this location as it would both constitute inappropriate development in the green belt and would also create an incongruous addition that would be visually intrusive in the surrounding views of the site and detract from the character and appearance of the area. In the absence of very special circumstances being demonstrated that would individually or cumulatively outweigh the substantial weight to given to the harm to the Green Belt and the other harm identified the development proposed would not accord with paragraphs 143 - 147 of the National Planning Policy Framework and policies CS8, DM5 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The assessment of this application is been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
The submitted Floor Plans do not show the direction of North. As this is a requirement for Floor Plans please review and amend the plans to add a North point.
